pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Olin Library, Department of Special Collections, Washington University
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains correspondence, minutes, notes, radio and television transcripts, reports, clippings, publications and other materials relating to the establishment and promotion of UAW stations WCUO, Cleveland, OH and WDET, Detroit, MI, 1948-1952. Correspondents include Morris Novick, an AFL-CIO radio consultant.
